name: Aws Cloud Discovery
shortDescription: Hazelcast AWS cloud module helps Hazelcast cluster members discover each other and form the cluster on AWS. It also supports tagging, IAM Role, and connecting clusters from clients outside the cloud.
longDescription: Hazelcast AWS cloud module helps Hazelcast cluster members discover each other and form the cluster on AWS. It also supports tagging, IAM Role, and connecting clusters from clients outside the cloud.  From Hazelcast 5.0, this functionality is built-in and requires no additional dependency.
